column1: 128kph, good length, inswinger, left alone outside off, it stays low through to the keeper
131kph, he walks down the track and checks a lofted drive head high past the bowler and it races to the rope straight of mid off!
129kph, back of a length, he walks at him again, but it's angled down leg and called wide
129kph, back of a length, sixth stump line, he pushes off the back foot to cover
126kph, cutter, on off, he defends to midwicket, wants one but is wisely sent back by Watson
back of a length slower ball, 115kph, wide of off, he checks his shot defending to cover
short slower ball, 113kph, outside off, he rolls a pull shot behind square to the sweeper in the deep
93kph, full leg break drifting into leg, he clips this hard wide of long on and they run two
tossed up leg break, he lofts this inside out over mid off not middled but it flies one bounce over the long off rope
flatter, 91kph, he tries to drive but mistimes back to the bowler
full, 90kph, drifting into leg, he drives hard to long on
92kph, full toss, he drives easily straight of mid on who is inside the circle! Nice gift first up
tossed up leg break, middle and off, he drives nicely just past cover and wide of long off for a couple
good length, 97kph, darted into leg, he goes back and works it to midwicket
angled down leg, he steps inside to sweep fine, gets a top edge but it flies well over short fine leg for a couple
wide of off, he reaches out and plays almost a one-handed sweep, roping it behind square for a couple
98kph, tossed up, he drives down to long on
101kph, darted into leg stump, he defends to midwicket
100kph, drifting into leg stump, he clips nicely into the gap wide of long on for two more
134kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
115kph, shorter slower ball, he pulls to deep square leg along the ground
130kph, good length, leg stump, he defends into the gap at midwicket

leading edge caught at point! Well bowled slower ball. It was a leg cutter, back of a length, he tried to close the face to work through the leg side, got a leading edge and it ballooned to Gulbis at point. Very simple catch.

caught at backward point! Another slower ball, 117kph, good length, wide of off, he threw the hands through it trying to square drive on the up, he sliced a catch to Larkin at backward point and another easy catch
118kph, slower leg cutter, tries to run to third man, gets an edge but it drops short of the keeper
11kph, slower ball, length, he whips this through midwicket to the sweeper
130kph, good length, outside off, he drives on the up and it falls just short of cover
129kph, full outswinger, nice flowing drive straight to cover-point
114kph, slower ball, on off, he works this off the back foot to midwicket
113kph, slower ball,  short, he pulls hard to deep backward square
116kph, slower ball wide of off, he steps out and whips this through wide mid on
back of a length wide of off, he late cuts wide of short third man and Zampa misfields allowing it to run away for four!
back of a length off stump, he defends into cover-point
off cutter slower ball, 112kph, wide of off, he tries to square cut but misses
128kph, length ball, nipping in, it takes him on the thigh guard, half a shout for LBW but it's high and going down leg
11kph, slower ball, short, he cracks a pull shot just over midwicket! He waited well and nailed it just over the man in the circle!
120kph short ball, and another superb pull shot! He swivelled inside the line and pulled it around behind square.
126kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot with an open face to point
126kph, good length off stump, he runs this down to third man off the front foot
125kph, shorter outside off, he checks a pull shot to midwicket
126kph, good length top of off, he's back and working this with his wrists square of midwicket
126kph, back of a length, fifth stump line, he cuts to backward point
109kph, good length slower ball on leg, he plays a pull shot down one knee, around to deep backward square
tossed up on off, he drives hard back to the bowler, who misfields and allows one
90kph, flatter on off, he's back and punching back to the bowler
89kph, he skips down and stays leg side and drives hard inside out to cover and Plunkett makes a good stop
87kph, slightly shorter, he's back and pulling to long on

caught at long off! Good catch by Dunk low down running in. It was tossed up outside off, he lofted a drive flat down to long off, Dunk was slow moving in and had to dive forward but took a very good catch low to the ground
87kph, wrong un, pitching outside off and zipping back, just off the inside edge onto pad. They went to appeal but aborted
tossed up on off, he drives back to the bowler
skips out early, he drags the length back, Root adjusts and pushes this wide of long on and they sprint a well run two
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
tossed up high, 78kph outside off, he mistimes a square drive to point
drifting into leg, he drives down to long on
darted into leg, 95kph, he slips this through midwicket to the sweeper
91kph, flatter on leg, he punches off the back foot to long on
full leg break outside off, he square drives slicing it past backward point, Gulbis has to run a long way to save it to his left on the rope coming from deep cover-point
full toss whacked along the ground to deep midwicket
88kph, leg break on off, he drives straight to cover
82kph, top spinner wide of off, he square drives to deep cover-point
87kph, short drag down, pulled hard to wide long on but Maxwell runs around and prevents a second run
124kph, fuller on middle and off, he clips this with the angle to deep midwicket
126kph, good length outside off, he tries to late cut but misses
124kph, short ball, he tries to hook, but misses, they appeal for caught behind but it's called wide!
128kph, fuller on off, he digs out a drive to cover
128kph, another play and miss trying to late cut a good length just outside off
105kph, slower ball, dipping, he picks it and turns it through square leg to the big boundary, they sprint back for a second beating the throw coming in
131kph, angled into leg stump, clipped neatly along the ground to deep midwicket
good length outside off, he's back and working this through mid on
130kph, full, he advances and drags it across the line to deep midwicket
short and wide, he cuts hard straight to deep cover-point
129kph, short ball on leg, he pulls with control along the ground to deep backward square
130kph, good length top of off, he defends back to the bowler

top edge caught by the keeper Gotch running back! Back of a length ball banged in, he tried to pull, got a top edge that flew straight up, Gotch ran to his left and camped under it and took a comfortable catch
125kph, good length on middle and leg, he pushes on the front foot to long on
129kph, good length, off stump, he pushes on the front foot back to the bowler

caught at midwicket! Oh no! Good length on middle and leg, he set himself to loft this over midwicket, mistimed it off the inside half the bat straight to Maxwell at midwicket and he took the catch moving easily to his right
130kph, fuller length, he drives to mid off with the full face
127kph, bouncer, he ducks underneath it easily
132kph, good length outswinger, he drives on the up through cover-point to the sweeper
130kph, angled into leg, he turns this around the corner to short fine leg
130kph, good length, angled to the top of off, he defends from the crease to cover
131kph, full wide yorker, squeezed out to cover
131kph, short ball on off, he's back and across and defending close in on the leg side for an easy one
130kph, short outside off, he cuts in the air part of the way to deep backward point
slower ball, 97kph, on leg, he tucks this behind square on the leg side into the gap
back of a length outside off, he defends into the gap at point
120kph, short ball chest high and he pulls this for six! Easy pickings, right in the arc for Sams and and he smashed over backward square
slices this over backward point on the front foot! What a shot! A hint of width, he threw the hands through it and scythed it over backward point and all the way!
124kph, low full toss, he pushes this down the ground to long on
126kph, good length on off, he defends from the crease to the gap at point
106kph, slower ball outside off, he checks his shot and defends
good length wide of off, he square drives to deep cover-point
129kph, full into the pads, it comes off the pad and runs away to midwicket for a leg bye
116kph, short slower ball, he backs away and slaps a flat batted pull to deep midwicket
full 130kph, into leg stump, he glances this fine of wide fine leg and he comes back for a tight second run
11kph, short slower ball, he tries to hook but misses and it's called wide! it was only just down leg. Tough call
129kph, full into the legs, he clips this away behind square into the gap and they run well again
131kph, speared into leg stump, he swings this off a thick inside edge through square leg to the sweeper at deep square
124kph, length ball, leg stump, he backs away and slaps it down to long on
125kph, good length middle and leg, he drives on the up down to long on
slower ball picked and he launches a towering up and under strike that sails over deep square leg!
127kph, full toss wide of off, he reaches and pushes it to cover-point
97kph, slower ball, full toss, he whips this along the ground to deep midwicket
130kph, full toss way wide of off
129kph, short ball outside off, he tries to upper cut but misses
101kph, slower ball, he backs away and drives low in the air, just past the bowler to long on. Hardly a chance
128kph, full wide yorker and he tries to run it off the open face but misses
134kph, half-volley inswinger, outside off, he drives hard to long off
yorker speared into leg stump, he bunts this out to midwicket and they run very well to get back for a couple
short outside off, he cuts hard in the air a fair way to deep point but it was short of the man
136kph, wide low full toss, he square drives to deep point
101kph short slower ball, he steps inside, has to wait and scoop it fine of short fine, mistiming it for a couple
128kph, full wide yorker, he misses trying to slash it away
126kph, full but too wide of off this time
130kph, low full toss but he gets underneath it and loft this high down the ground straight of long on! Incredible power and hand speed to get under it
full and wide of off, he slices this behind point for a couple

caught at deep point! Stoinis gets lucky there. That was a thigh high full toss, he slices this flat and hard to deep point but straight at Zampa and he holds onto a good catch! If it was hit 10m either side it was six
98kph, slower ball, he sits back and drags this through wide mid on and Green gambles to sprint back for two, the throw just misses and he's safe!
full into leg stump, he just jams this out to long on
89kph slower ball, completely deceives him outside off, they pinch a bye as Gotch's throw is wide
top edge skied straight up to the keeper! Brilliant slower ball. He tried to swing it away, but got underneath it and hit it straight up, Gotch barely had to move as it fell straight into his gloves
103kph, slower ball full toss wide of off, he toes it back to the bowler

run out trying to pinch two! Dunk gets it done. It was a slower ball chipped in the air down to long off, Dunk runs in to try and take the catch, he got it on the half volley diving forward, they try for a second run but Dunk 's throw is a touch wide but Bravo gathers easily and takes the bails off as he is well short
slower ball, deceives him again, big swing and miss, they pinch a bye
128kph, full toss outside off, hint of swing, he defends to backward point
130kph, shorter length outside off, he stands up and cracks it straight to cover
131kph, full outswinger and he leans into a drive and times it beautifully past cover-point. Too full and put away
129kph, not quite as full but still driven straight to cover
131kph, good length, he drives off a thick edge at it runs along the ground to third man
128kph, full, swing back into off, he drives off a thick inside edge through forward square to the sweeper
good length outswinger on off, he's back and across and defending
133kph, fuller outswinger, he drives to mid off on the circle and goes with the stroke for a single
130kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to backward point
132kph, good length wide of off but he square drives on the up, glorious timing, the fielder gets a touch on it but it races away
swinging into the pads and clips this powerfully behind square to the rope!
131kph, good length outside off, he's back and cutting to cover-point
129kph, fired way down the leg side
131kph, back of a length on middle and leg, he's back and defending
132kph, short on the hip, he glances this fine for four! Too easy this. Just a bad ball with no fine leg back
135kph, good length angled across, he defends on the front foot, gets a thick outside edge that runs to wide third man

caught at cover! Great catch by Root! 132kph full outside off, he drives hard but hits it in the air to cover, Root is forced to dive forward but holds onto the catch just above the grass! Great catch. Never easy to move forward like that
135kph, good length, on off, he defends on the front foot pushing to mid on
132kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes on the up placing nicely between cover-point and cover
leg break, 90kph, on off, he defends to cover
92kph, leg break, he clears the front leg and slices this up and over wide mid off, didn't time it but gets a couple
tossed up and he cracks this down the ground, one bounce into the sightscreen! Just a half volley and he lofts through the line
shorter length on leg, he's back and tucking this through square leg
pushed through on middle, he's back and defending to midwicket
87kph, sliding on, hits the pad, huge appeal for LBW, given not out. That was very close. Maybe just hit outside the line.
good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
off cutter, on off, he defends with soft hands short of cover and they pinch one
back of a length, 134kph, outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover-point
114kph, slower ball, outside off, he pushes on the front foot into the gap between point and backward point, Fawad running around from third man makes the diving save
133kph, good length on leg, he checks his shot, pushing it to midwicket
short and angled across and he cuts hard up and over backward point! Used the angled and width to hammer it up and over the men in the circle behind point
shorter length on off, he's back and punching past midwicket to long on
87kph, top spinner, he backs away to loft inside out, gets a thick inside edge through square leg, they push hard to come back from two and Stoinis just beats the throw
drag down half tracker, he pulls this away easily forward of square and it bounces once over the rope
leg break tossed up outside off, he swings through the line lofting this up and over mid off! Such an easy swing of the bat from Stoinis
tossed up again and he goes again, lofting flatter and harder over mid off! Stoinis destroying Cook here
flatter on off, he's back and punching to cover
82kph, shorter wrong un, he's back and punching to deep cover-point
shorter leg break, he's back and pulling along the ground to wide long on
tossed up way wide of off, it spins sharply away and is called wide
84kph, ripping leg break, he's back and defending off the outside edge to backward point
faster leg break, he sits back and defends to cover

sliced to backward point! A mistake from Stoinis. It was a shorter leg break, he gave himself room to thump this off the back foot and sliced a thick edge that balloons to Sandhu at backward point. Simple catch for Sandhu. Handy wicket for the Thunder
full leg break, he pushes on the front foot to cover
95kph, slided this across the right hander, he misses the cut shot
shorter on off, 98kph, he's back and punching back to the bowler
flatter on middle, he defends from the crease
tossed up outside off, 99kph, he drives to square drive and misses
98kph, flatter on off, he punches back to the bowler
full on leg stump, he drives to long on
79kph. short outside off, he cuts straight to backward point
square drives to deep point
85kph, flatter outside off, he's back and cutting to deep cover-point
slower and wider he cuts behind point and runs well for a couple
slower and shorter, 77kph, he's back and punching straight to cover
pushed through outside off, he forces off the back foot to deep cover
tossed up on middle and leg, he drives to long on
97kph, good length off break, he pushes easily to mid on
87kph slower wide of off, he square drives backward of point
tossed up outside off, he drives this hard along the ground to long on
shorter wide of off, he's back and cutting hard to deep backward point
87kph, tossed up outside off and Maxwell launches this over long on and it goes way back in the stands! Magnificent strike! That went to the second level in the grandstand!
wrong un, shorter, he's back and punching from middle through point to the sweeper
drifting into leg, he clips this to short fine and takes one
powerful slog sweep against the turn over midwicket into the stands! he nailed that
leg break wide of off, he drives hard to deep cover-point
good length leg break, he's back and defending from the crease to the bowler
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
good length on leg, he clips this easily behind square into the gap for a couple
127kph, back of a length on leg, he gets hit on the thigh guard, it drops down on the leg side and they get a leg bye
bouncer, he makes a late decision to upper cut over the keeper's head! Great stroke
slower ball wide of off, he dabs this down to third man
good length outside off, he tries to whip to leg, misses, gets hit on the back thigh
slower ball, leg stump, he clips this nicely behind square but straight to the sweeper this time
115kph, angled into middle, he tucks this easily behind square, well placed for two
127kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this behind square again into the gap for two. Smart batting
129kph, fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive back past the bowler to long on
good length off stump, he pushes firmly on the up to long on
shorter into the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and rolls to the fine leg rope, long chase for Fawad, he gets there and slides past the ball! It rolls slowly into the rope for four leg byes
short ball, he swivels inside the line and pulls powerfully behind square just wide of Fawad at wide fine leg!
full into the legs, outside leg stump, it comes off the pad and rolls away for a leg bye
120kph, slower ball, he pushes it to midwicket, Maxwell wants one but Larkin sends him back wisely as Root would have run him out
11kph, slower ball outside off, he pushes to backward point
131kph, length ball, he lofts this just over mid on. It was mistimed but he got enough of it to clear mid on running back
113kph, full wide of off, he drives neatly past cover to the sweeper
shorter slower ball, he sits back and waits and pulls this around through square leg
full outside leg, he pushes this nicely into the gap and midwicket and call two straight away. Superb running and placement
full toss, leg stump, he drives to long on
76kph, shorter ball outside off, he cuts to deep point
80kph full toss, he whips this straight to deep midwicket
full top spinner, he picks it and drives easily to long off
drifting into leg, he clips this easily against the turn through midwicket to the sweeper
full toss, driven to long on
full outside off, he whips this with control through midwicket to the sweeper
fired into leg stump, he turns this behind square to the sweeper at deep backward square
tossed up outside off, he slog sweeps along the ground to deep midwicket
full on leg stump, he clips this off his toes through midwicket to the man in the deep
short into leg stump, he's back and whipping this through forward square
angled way down the leg side and called wide
109kph slower ball on off, he turns this off the front foot to midwicket
114kph. full outside off, he drives easily to cover
134kph, short ball, skidded on quicker, he pulls awkwardly forward of square
110kph, slower ball back of a length, he turns this off the back foot to midwicket
134kph, short ball, pulled with control to deep square leg
slower ball, he tried to end it one blow, heaving over midwicket, but got through the shot and got it off the toe-end of the bat
130kph, thigh high full toss, he pushes it straight of mid off
launches this over deep midwicket! What a way to end it! Good length outside off and he just stepped forward and smeared it over deep midwicket! He is some player
